pattern: Globally, it is always the case that P holds.
After Q, it is always the case that P holds.
After Q until R, it is always the case that P holds.

smt.smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and (>= time 0) (<= time MAX_TIME))
        (=>
            (and (Q time) (not (R time)))
            (or
                (not (exists
                    ((time2 Int))
                    (and (>= time2 time) (<= time2 MAX_TIME) (not (P time2)))
                ))
                (exists
                    ((time3 Int))
                    (and
                        (> time3 time)
                        (<= time3 MAX_TIME)
                        (R time3)
                        (not (exists
                            ((time4 Int))
                            (and (>= time4 time) (< time4 time3) (not (P time4)))
                        ))
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
)
smt.scope_smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and (>= time 0) (<= time MAX_TIME))
        (=>
            (P_TRUE time)
            (exists
                ((time2 Int))
                (and 
                    (>= time2 0) 
                    (<= time2 time) 
                    (Q time2)
                    (not (exists
                        ((time3 Int))
                        (and (>= time3 time2) (<= time3 time) (R time3))
                    ))
                )
            )
        )
    )
)

pattern: When Q, it is always the case that P holds.
Globally, it is always the case that P holds after t timeUnits.

smt.smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and (>= time t) (<= time MAX_TIME))
        (P time)
    )
)

pattern: Globally, it is always the case that P holds within t timeUnits.
Globally, it is always the case that P holds between t1 timeUnits and t2 timeUnits.

smt.smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and (>= time t1) (< time t2))
        (P time)
    )
)

pattern: After Q, it is always the case that P holds after t timeUnits.
After Q, it is always the case that P holds within t timeUnits.

smt.smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and
            (>= time 0)
            (<= time MAX_TIME)
        )
        (=>
            (and
                (Q time)
                (not (exists
                    ((time1 Int))
                    (and
                        (< time1 time)
                        (> time1 (- time t))
                        (>= time1 0)
                        (Q time1)
                    )
                ))
            )
            (not (exists
                ((time2 Int))
                (and
                    (>= time2 time)
                    (< time2 (+ time t))
                    (<= time2 MAX_TIME)
                    (not (P time2))
                )
            ))   
        )
    )
)
smt.scope_smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and
            (>= time 0)
            (<= time MAX_TIME)
        )
        (=>
            (P_TRUE time)
            (exists
                ((time2 Int))
                (and
                    (<= time2 time)
                    (> time2 (- time t))
                    (>= time2 0)
                    (Q time2)
                    (not (exists
                        ((time3 Int))
                        (and
                            (< time3 time2)
                            (> time3 (- time2 t))
                            (>= time3 0)
                            (Q time3)
                        )
                    ))
                )
            )   
        )
    )
)

pattern: After Q, it is always the case that P holds between t1 timeUnits and t2 timeUnits.

smt.smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))

                    ((time1 Int))

                        (< time1 time)
                        (> time1 (- time t2))
                        (>= time1 0)
                        (Q time1)
                    )
                ))
            )
            (not (exists
                ((time2 Int))
                (and
                    (>= time2 (+ time t1))
                    (< time2 (+ time t2))
                    (<= time2 MAX_TIME)
                    (not (P time2))
                )
            ))   
        )
    )
)
smt.scope_smt:
(forall
    ((time Int))
    (=>
        (and
            (>= time 0)
            (<= time MAX_TIME)
        )
        (=>
            (P_TRUE time)
            (exists
                ((time2 Int))
                (and
                    (<= time2 (- time t1))
                    (> time2 (- time t2))
                    (>= time2 0)
                    (Q time2)
                    (not (exists
                        ((time3 Int))
                        (and
                            (< time3 time2)
                            (> time3 (- time2 t2))
                            (>= time3 0)
                            (Q time3)
                        )
                    ))
                )
            )   
        )
    )
)

pattern: After Q until R, it is always the case that P holds and still holds for t timeUnits after the end of the scope.
